sn44.8:4.1: Then the wanderer Vacchagotta went up to the Buddha
sn44.8:4.3: When the greetings and polite conversation were over, he sat down to one side,
sn44.8:4.5: “Master Gotama, is this right: ‘the world is eternal’?”
sn44.8:4.6: “This has not been declared by me, Vaccha.” …
sn44.8:4.8: “Then is this right: ‘a Realized One neither exists nor doesn’t exist after death’?”
sn44.8:4.9: “This too has not been declared by me.”
sn44.8:5.1: “What’s the cause, Master Gotama, what’s the reason why the wanderers who follow other paths answer these questions when asked?
sn44.8:5.4: And what’s the cause, what’s the reason why Master Gotama doesn’t answer these questions when asked?”
sn44.8:6.1: “Vaccha, the wanderers who follow other paths regard form as self, self as having form, form in self, or self in form.
sn44.8:6.5: consciousness as self, self as having consciousness, consciousness in self, or self in consciousness.
sn44.8:6.6: That’s why they answer these questions when asked.
sn44.8:6.9: The Realized One doesn’t regard form as self, self as having form, form in self, or self in form.
sn44.8:6.13: consciousness as self, self as having consciousness, consciousness in self, or self in consciousness.
sn44.8:6.14: That’s why he doesn’t answer these questions when asked.
sn44.8:7.1: Then the wanderer Vacchagotta got up from his seat and went to Venerable Mahāmoggallāna,
sn44.8:7.3: When the greetings and polite conversation were over, he sat down to one side.
sn44.8:7.4: He asked Mahāmoggallāna the same questions, and received the same answers. Then he said:
sn44.8:10.2: How the meaning and the phrasing of the teacher and the disciple fit together and agree without contradiction when it comes to the chief matter!
sn44.8:10.3: Just now I went to the ascetic Gotama and asked him about this matter.
sn44.8:10.4: And he explained it to me with these words and phrases, just like Master Moggallāna.
sn44.8:10.5: It’s incredible, Master Moggallāna, it’s amazing!
sn44.8:10.6: How the meaning and the phrasing of the teacher and the disciple fit together and agree without contradiction when it comes to the chief matter!”
